content.en_US:
A useful liquid that is obtained in an [[oil refinery|Oil Refinery]] during the [[advanced oil processing|Advanced Oil Processing]]. It allows the production of [[rubber|Rubber]], [[PVC|PVC]], and [[C4|Composition C-4]] in the [[chemical plant|Chemical Plant]]. It is used in the industrial mixer to obtain [[lubricant|Engine Lubricant]], [[perfluoromethyl|Perfluoromethyl]], and [[phosgene|Phosgene]].

Alternate ways to obtain unsaturated hydrocarbons include [[cracking|Catalytic Cracking Tower]] [[reformate|Reformate]] and [[reforming|Reforming]] [[petroleum gas|Petroleum Gas]], both of which require [[vacuum refinery|Vacuum Refinery]].
